title: Self Aligning Dart Board
detail: Dart board moves so you get a bullseye every time
extended_details: We will construct a carriage able to move in both axes, similar to a 3D printer carriage, using stepper motors and timing belts, and mount a dart board to it. Then using two webcams and CV, we will track the throw of a dart and move the board accordingly to make this a bullseye.

parts_and_costs.part: CNBTR Horizontal Linear Motion Ball Bearing Slide Bushing 8mm Dia &Sha
